Control Name: Adjusts Scope and Frequency—Management varies the scope and frequency of separate evaluations depending on risk.

control_attributes.Control: Adjusts Scope and Frequency—Management varies the scope and frequency of separate evaluations depending on risk.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC4.1 COSO Principle 16: The entity selects, develops, and performs ongoing and/or separate evaluations to ascertain whether the components of internal control are present and functioning.
